Parameters: Snackbar: The transient bottom bar which is now visible.

ClassDesc: Callback class for @B_android#support#design#widget#Snackbar_E@ instances. Note: this class is here to provide backwards-compatible way for apps written before the existence of the base @B_android#support#design#widget#BaseTransientBottomBar_E@ class.
